Class HomeworkDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.HomeworkDAO
public class HomeworkDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for Homework entities. Provides CRUD operations for the Homework table in the database.

  • Method Details

    • addHomework

      public int addHomework(Homework homework) throws SQLException
      Creates a new homework assignment in the database.
      Parameters:
      homework - The homework object to be added to the database
      Returns:
      The generated homework ID if successful
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • getHomeworkById

      public Optional<Homework> getHomeworkById(int homeworkId)
      Retrieves a homework assignment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      homeworkId - The ID of the homework to retrieve
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the homework if found, or empty if not found

    • getAllHomework

      public List<Homework> getAllHomework()
      Retrieves all homework assignments from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all homework assignments

    • getHomeworkByClass

      public List<Homework> getHomeworkByClass(int classId)
      Retrieves homework assignments for a specific class.
      Parameters:
      classId - The ID of the class
      Returns:
      A list of homework assignments for the specified class

    • getHomeworkByStatus

      public List<Homework> getHomeworkByStatus(boolean status)
      Retrieves homework assignments by status.
      Parameters:
      status - The status to filter by (true = completed, false = not completed)
      Returns:
      A list of homework assignments with the specified status

    • getOverdueHomework

      public List<Homework> getOverdueHomework()
      Retrieves overdue homework assignments.
      Returns:
      A list of overdue homework assignments

    • updateHomework

      public boolean updateHomework(Homework homework)
      Updates an existing homework assignment record.
      Parameters:
      homework - The homework object with updated information
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • updateHomeworkStatus

      public boolean updateHomeworkStatus(int homeworkId, boolean status)
      Updates the status of a homework assignment.
      Parameters:
      homeworkId - The ID of the homework
      status - The new status (true = completed, false = not completed)
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • deleteHomework

      public boolean deleteHomework(int homeworkId)
      Deletes a homework assignment from the database.
      Parameters:
      homeworkId - The ID of the homework to delete
      Returns:
      true if the deletion was successful, false otherwise
